attributes.action: Remove over counter Paracetemol tablets from Prescriptions due to cost to NHS
attributes.additional_details: there is a substantial saving to the NHS for this and with the state of the service to save this national benefit it needs help
attributes.background: from a basic understanding it is costing the NHS around £10 per prescription for paracetemol tablets readily available over the counter at a price starting at 16 pence going up depending on brand.
